title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Hezbollah Targets Across Southern Lebanon: An Inside Look at the Battle Against Terrorism”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

Terrorist infrastructures, a launching station, and military facilities; IDF forces are attacking Hezbollah’s terror targets in six areas simultaneously in southern Lebanon.

Earlier today, air force fighter jets attacked Hezbollah’s military facilities in several areas in southern Lebanon, including in Blyda, Maroun A-ras, Yaron, and Al-Hiyam. In addition, a terrorist infrastructure of Hezbollah in the Kfar Hammam area was attacked, alongside a portable launcher of the organization in a Aita Al-Shaab area in southern Lebanon.

During the day, two aerial targets were identified crossing from Lebanon towards the north of the country, one of them was intercepted by our air defense fighters, causing minor damage and no casualties.

Documentation from the attacks attached: https://bit.ly/3WsZCxN
